Average velocity is the rate of change in position with respect to time. In a word problem , if   two different position  and time interval to cover the above position are given, then average velocity has to be obtained. If an expression showing relation between x and t  are given such that x= 5 t^2, then, instantaneous velocity has to be obtained. Instantaneous velocity is the velocity at a particular instant.
